safetyTips: Disposable gloves replaced at every drop, hand sanitiser, extended safe distancing, order left on ground. Payment by BACS online ordering, contactless card machine or cash left in neutral, safe position.
name: QUIRKY TRUFFLES
description: Artisan chocolate Truffles using unique flavour pairings, high quality essential oils, prize winning local farm butter fresh fruit & ingredients wherever possible. Ever evolving menu with over 50 flavours & introducing new product Luxury Chocolate Squares for a family treat during lockdown. Delivery - £10 minimum spend or £15 minimum spend or delivery over 15 miles. Email order form/phone/message.
